summary.para: Retrieves the version of sample protection that the component implements on input.

param.name: pdwVersion
param.para: Receives a member of the enumeration.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

summary.para: Retrieves the version of sample protection that the component implements on output.

param.name: pdwVersion
param.para: Receives a member of the enumeration.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

param.name: dwVersion
param.para: Specifies the version number of the sample protection scheme for which to receive a certificate. The version number is specified as a enumeration value.

param.name: ppCert
param.para: Receives a pointer to a buffer containing the certificate. The caller must free the memory for the buffer by calling .

param.name: pcbCert
param.para: Receives the size of the ppCert buffer, in bytes.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

remarks.para: For certain version numbers of sample protection, the downstream component must provide a certificate. Components that do not support these version numbers can return E_NOTIMPL.

summary.para: Initializes sample protection on the downstream component.

param.name: dwVersion
param.para: Specifies the version number of the sample protection scheme. The version number is specified as a enumeration value.

param.name: dwInputId
param.para: Identifier of the input stream. The identifier corresponds to the output stream identifier returned by the interface.

param.name: pbSeed
param.para: Pointer to a buffer that contains the initialization data provided by the upstream component. To retrieve this buffer, call .

param.name: cbSeed
param.para: Size of the pbSeed buffer, in bytes.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

summary.para: Retrieves initialization information for sample protection from the upstream component.

param.name: dwVersion
param.para: Specifies the version number of the sample protection scheme. The version number is specified as a enumeration value.

param.name: dwOutputId
param.para: Identifier of the output stream. The identifier corresponds to the output stream identifier returned by the interface.

param.name: pbCert
param.para: Pointer to a certificate provided by the downstream component.

param.name: cbCert
param.para: Size of the certificate, in bytes.

param.name: ppbSeed
param.para: Receives a pointer to a buffer that contains the initialization information for downstream component. The caller must free the memory for the buffer by calling .

param.name: pcbSeed
param.para: Receives the size of the ppbSeed buffer, in bytes.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

remarks.para: This method must be implemented by the upstream component. The method fails if the component does not support the requested sample protection version. Downstream components do not implement this method and should return E_NOTIMPL.

summary.para: Provides encryption for media data inside the protected media path (PMP).
